name: explore-ableton-live-with-nodejs-websockets
description: This project will explore working with [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en) and [Ableton Live](https://www.ableton.com/en/live/) - inspired by the work at [https://ricardomatias.net/ableton-live/#md:ableton-live](https://ricardomatias.net/ableton-live/#md:ableton-live).
author: Rob Brennan <rob@therobbrennan.com>
